verses.text: Give answer \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry, O God \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness; make me free from \w my|strong="H1732"\w* troubles; \w have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5058"\w* me, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* give ear \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer.

\w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* sons \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w men|strong="H7121"\w*, \w how|strong="H6030"\w* long \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* go \w on|strong="H0430"\w* turning \w my|strong="H8085"\w* glory into shame? \w how|strong="H6030"\w* long \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* love \w to|strong="H8085"\w* foolish things, going after \w what|strong="H6664"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* false? (Selah.)

See \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H0376"\w* \w made|strong="H1245"\w* great \w his|strong="H0376"\w* mercy \w for|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H1121"\w*; \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0376"\w* give ear \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* cry.

Let \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hearts, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H8085"\w* no sin; \w have|strong="H3045"\w* bitter feelings \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* bed, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* no \w sound|strong="H8085"\w*. (Selah.)
Give \w the|strong="H0559"\w* offerings \w of|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness, \w and|strong="H3824"\w* put \w your|strong="H5921"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* numbers \w who|strong="H3068"\w* say, \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* do \w us|strong="H0413"\w* any good? \w the|strong="H0413"\w* light \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* face \w has|strong="H3068"\w* gone \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5375"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \w more|strong="H5921"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* wine \w are|strong="H3068"\w* increased.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* rest \w on|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* bed \w in|strong="H5414"\w* peace, because \w you|strong="H5414"\w* only, Lord, keep \w me|strong="H5414"\w* safe.
